title: No going home for a johannesburg student
text:
Last week on Monday the 14th of September I booked a bus ticket online through the Translux website from Johannesburg park city station to Polokwane train station for this current week Wednesday on the 23rd of September.
I paid for the bus fare using my debit card online and I got a confirmation sms from my bank saying that the payment went through and I got worried since I didn't get a reference number from Translux.
From there I started calling their national call centre and the agent told me that they don't see my payment and the reason I was provided with was that since I use a different bank from theirs it would take 48 hours.
On Wednesday the 16th I called and the agent still told me that they don't see my payment and I had to email them my bank statement with the highlighted transaction made regarding this matter and even now there's no light at the end of the tunnel after I sent them my bank statement and it means I won't go home tomorrow.
Their query service is so poor and I had to spend money everyday so that I can call them on daily basis to make a follow up but nothing positive came out of my efforts.
I don't know why they can't make a follow up on the bank statement I provided them with last week and even the bank reassured me that the money went through and it's not hanging somewhere it is in their bank.
